subs.floocraftft.greened: O pó de flu atinge o fogo
gui.floo_sign.title: Configurações da rede de flu
gui.floo_sign.name_in_use: Já existe uma lareira com esse nome
gui.peek.out_of_range: Falha ao espreitar: você está olhando em algum lugar além da sua distância de renderização
gui.teleport.title: Escolha um local de destino
config.client.dizzy: If true, there is a disorienting camera-wobbling effect when you teleport with Floo Powder.
config.client.flash: If true, there is a green or magenta flash when you teleport with Floo Powder.
config.common.deplete: If true, fires from craftable Floo Powder will allow a limited number of teleports before reverting to normal fire.
config.common.item_tp: If true, dropped items that touch Floo fires WILL teleport to a random fireplace. Never consumes Floo Powder.
config.common.mob_tp: As with villagers, but for Sheep, Cows, Spiders, Silverfish, Zombies etc. Never consumes Floo Powder.
config.common.villager_tp: If true, villagers who wander into Floo fires MAY teleport to a random fireplace. Never consumes Floo Powder.
config.common.safety: When arriving in a normal fire, the fire converts to Floo fire temporarily. It will stay like that for this many ticks, before returning to normal.
